channel.title: Simple Track Contest
channel.description:
Hey everyone! I got a challenge for you!

Every song I hear on soundcloud is full of wonderful melodies, chords, changes, drum loops, and automation. But my challenge today is to make a simple, but changing and progressing track.

Here are the rules.

You may ONLY have: . 2 Melodic loops: You can have any one or two instruments you wish, but the track can only contain 2 melodic loops (Any sound pack allowed) 1 Chord loop 1 bass: Through the whole song you are only allowed to use one bass loop. 2 drum loops: Use this wisely!

Exceptions

You are allowed to have any tempo, key, and swing. You are allowed to have as many automations as you wish: Use this to help make your track fun and non-repetitive You are allowed to use the sweeper as much as you want.

Please note:

Your song must be at LEAST 3 Minutes in length. The main challenge is to see how well you can make a simple beat into a full song, without being repetitive or boring.

When submitting

Please upload to soundcloud, post your project link and soundcloud link here If anyone actually thinks this is a decent idea and participates :P I will get together the best entries at the end of this month Have fun :smiley:

item.title: Simple Track Contest
item.dc:creator: therealejoc
item.description:
Oh. Wish I would’ve known that. I work fast so that I avoid overthinking so I’m already done. Exactly 3 minutes btw edit: the track is three minutes not the time I spent on it https://app.auxy.co/projects/aC4Ev26CtPIh_9JuikHlKg==

item.title: Simple Track Contest
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
Hey everyone! I got a challenge for you!

Every song I hear on soundcloud is full of wonderful melodies, chords, changes, drum loops, and automation. But my challenge today is to make a simple, but changing and progressing track.

Here are the rules.

You may ONLY have: 
                                     .

2 Melodic loops: You can have any one or two instruments you wish, but the track can only contain 2 melodic loops (Any sound pack allowed)

1 Chord loop

1 bass: Through the whole song you are only allowed to use one bass loop.

2 drum loops: Use this wisely!

Exceptions

You are allowed to have any tempo, key, and swing. You are allowed to have as many automations as you wish: Use this to help make your track fun and non-repetitive

You are allowed to use the sweeper as much as you want.

Please note:

Your song must be at LEAST 3 Minutes in length. The main challenge is to see how well you can make a simple beat into a full song, without being repetitive or boring.

When submitting

Please upload to soundcloud, post your project link and soundcloud link here

If anyone actually thinks this is a decent idea and participates I will get together the best entries at the end of this month

Have fun
